snippet.title: Gout
snippet.description:
Gout
This patient education program discusses gout including the causes, risk factors, symptoms ... (more)
This patient education program discusses gout including the causes, risk factors, symptoms and stages, diagnosis, treatment, and prevention. It also reviews joint anatomy and arthritis. This resource is a MedlinePlus Interactive Health Tutorial from the National Library of Medicine, designed and developed by the Patient Education Institute. (less)

snippet.title: Fascinating Friction!
snippet.description:
Fascinating Friction!
In this activity, students use wood, wax paper and oil to investigate ... (more)
In this activity, students use wood, wax paper and oil to investigate the importance of lubrication between materials and to understand the concept of friction. Using wax paper and oil placed between pieces of wood, the function of lubricants between materials is illustrated. Students extend their understanding of friction to bones and joints in the skeletal system and become aware of what engineers can do to help reduce friction in the human body as well as in machines. (less)
Subject:
Mathematics and Statistics Science and Technology Material Type:
Activities and Labs Lesson Plans Collection:
TeachEngineering Provider:
TeachEngineering Author:
Abigail Watrous Beth Myers Denali Lander Janet Yowell Jessica Todd Malinda Schaefer Zarske Sara Born
